title: Out A Coach
description:
Pablo Torre and Tony Kornheiser discuss their thoughts on Ime Udoka’s possible suspension for a consensual relationship with a Celtics staff member, what the most intriguing aspect of tonight’s TNF game is and if Norman’s lobbying is helping or hurting LIV golfers’ chances to play in PGA events. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Ime Udoka faces possible suspension by the Celtics and what is most intriguing aspect of tonights Steelers/Browns game.
